resources: // App Wide Version 0.01 beta SSA Settings Smart Safety Alert Ride Safer Technologies by // Full Screen Alarm Fullscreen_Alarm_Activity Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT // User Manual User_Manual_Activity User Manual // About Screen SSA Status Bluetooth: Disconnected Child in Car-Seat: Not In Seat Temperature Threshold: Within Threshold The Smart Safety Alert (SSA) system will alert you when you disconnect or are disconnected from your SSA hardware via Bluetooth while a child is still detected in the car-seat.
